casebody.data:
PEOPLE OF the STATE OF CALIFORNIA, C. J. Fitzharris, Superintendent, etc., Appellants, v. Herman TAPIA, Jr., Appellee. No. 21073. United States Court of Appeals Ninth Circuit. Aug. 5, 1966. Thomas C. Lynch, Atty. Gen., Robert R. Granucci, Clifton R. Jeffers, Deputy Attys. Gen., San Francisco, Cal., for appellant. John Mallick, Berkeley, Cal., for ap-pellee.

Before JERTBERG, DUNIWAY and ELY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM:

The order appealed from is reversed. Johnson v. State of New Jersey, 384 U.S. 719, 86 S.Ct. 1772, 16 L.Ed.2d 882; Miranda v. State of Arizona, 384 U.S. 436, 86 S.Ct. 1602, 16 L.Ed.2d 694.
